speaker: WARWICK
text:
What
               
              counsel
              ,
               
              lords
              ?
               
              Edward
               
              from
               
              Belgia
              ,

speaker: WARWICK
text:
With
               
              hasty
               
              Germans
               
              and
               
              blunt
               
              Hollanders
              ,

speaker: WARWICK
text:
Hath
               
              passed
               
              in
               
              safety
               
              through
               
              the
               
              Narrow
               
              Seas
              ,

speaker: WARWICK
text:
And
               
              with
               
              his
               
              troops
               
              doth
               
              march
               
              amain
               
              to
               
              London
              ,

speaker: WARWICK
text:
And
               
              many
               
              giddy
               
              people
               
              flock
               
              to
               
              him
              .

speaker:
KING
               
              HENRY
text:
Let’s
               
              levy
               
              men
               
              and
               
              beat
               
              him
               
              back
               
              again
              .

speaker: CLARENCE
text:
A
               
              little
               
              fire
               
              is
               
              quickly
               
              trodden
               
              out
              ,

speaker: CLARENCE
text:
Which
              ,
               
              being
               
              suffered
              ,
               
              rivers
               
              cannot
               
              quench
              .

speaker: WARWICK
text:
In
               
              Warwickshire
               
              I
               
              have
               
              true-hearted
               
              friends
              ,

speaker: WARWICK
text:
Not
               
              mutinous
               
              in
               
              peace
               
              yet
               
              bold
               
              in
               
              war
              .

speaker: WARWICK
text:
Those
               
              will
               
              I
               
              muster
               
              up
              ;
               
              and
               
              thou
              ,
               
              son
               
              Clarence
              ,

speaker: WARWICK
text:
Shalt
               
              stir
               
              up
               
              in
               
              Suffolk
              ,
               
              Norfolk
              ,
               
              and
               
              in
               
              Kent

speaker: WARWICK
text:
The
               
              knights
               
              and
               
              gentlemen
               
              to
               
              come
               
              with
               
              thee
              .
              —

speaker: WARWICK
text:
Thou
              ,
               
              brother
               
              Montague
              ,
               
              in
               
              Buckingham
              ,

speaker: WARWICK
text:
Northampton
              ,
               
              and
               
              in
               
              Leicestershire
               
              shalt
               
              find

speaker: WARWICK
text:
Men
               
              well
               
              inclined
               
              to
               
              hear
               
              what
               
              thou
               
              command’st
              .
              —

speaker: WARWICK
text:
And
               
              thou
              ,
               
              brave
               
              Oxford
              ,
               
              wondrous
               
              well
               
              beloved
              ,

speaker: WARWICK
text:
In
               
              Oxfordshire
               
              shalt
               
              muster
               
              up
               
              thy
               
              friends
              .
              —

speaker: WARWICK
text:
My
               
              sovereign
              ,
               
              with
               
              the
               
              loving
               
              citizens
              ,

speaker: WARWICK
text:
Like
               
              to
               
              his
               
              island
               
              girt
               
              in
               
              with
               
              the
               
              ocean
              ,

speaker: WARWICK
text:
Or
               
              modest
               
              Dian
               
              circled
               
              with
               
              her
               
              nymphs
              ,

speaker: WARWICK
text:
Shall
               
              rest
               
              in
               
              London
               
              till
               
              we
               
              come
               
              to
               
              him
              .

speaker: WARWICK
text:
Fair
               
              lords
              ,
               
              take
               
              leave
              ,
               
              and
               
              stand
               
              not
               
              to
               
              reply
              .
              —

speaker: WARWICK
text:
Farewell
              ,
               
              my
               
              sovereign
              .

speaker:
KING
               
              HENRY
text:
Farewell
              ,
               
              my
               
              Hector
               
              and
               
              my
               
              Troy’s
               
              true
               
              hope
              .

speaker: CLARENCE
text:
In
               
              sign
               
              of
               
              truth
              ,
               
              I
               
              kiss
               
              your
               
              Highness’
               
              hand
              .

speaker:
KING
               
              HENRY
text:
Well-minded
               
              Clarence
              ,
               
              be
               
              thou
               
              fortunate
              .

speaker: MONTAGUE
text:
Comfort
              ,
               
              my
               
              lord
              ;
               
              and
               
              so
               
              I
               
              take
               
              my
               
              leave
              .

speaker: OXFORD
text:
And
               
              thus
               
              I
               
              seal
               
              my
               
              truth
              ,
               
              and
               
              bid
               
              adieu
              .

speaker:
KING
               
              HENRY
text:
Sweet
               
              Oxford
               
              and
               
              my
               
              loving
               
              Montague

speaker:
KING
               
              HENRY
text:
And
               
              all
               
              at
               
              once
              ,
               
              once
               
              more
               
              a
               
              happy
               
              farewell
              .

speaker: WARWICK
text:
Farewell
              ,
               
              sweet
               
              lords
              .
               
              Let’s
               
              meet
               
              at
               
              Coventry
              .

speaker:
KING
               
              HENRY
text:
Here
               
              at
               
              the
               
              palace
               
              will
               
              I
               
              rest
               
              awhile
              .

speaker:
KING
               
              HENRY
text:
Cousin
               
              of
               
              Exeter
              ,
               
              what
               
              thinks
               
              your
               
              Lordship
              ?

speaker:
KING
               
              HENRY
text:
Methinks
               
              the
               
              power
               
              that
               
              Edward
               
              hath
               
              in
               
              field

speaker:
KING
               
              HENRY
text:
Should
               
              not
               
              be
               
              able
               
              to
               
              encounter
               
              mine
              .

speaker: EXETER
text:
The
               
              doubt
               
              is
               
              that
               
              he
               
              will
               
              seduce
               
              the
               
              rest
              .

speaker:
KING
               
              HENRY
text:
That’s
               
              not
               
              my
               
              fear
              .
               
              My
               
              meed
               
              hath
               
              got
               
              me
               
              fame
              .

speaker:
KING
               
              HENRY
text:
I
               
              have
               
              not
               
              stopped
               
              mine
               
              ears
               
              to
               
              their
               
              demands
              ,

speaker:
KING
               
              HENRY
text:
Nor
               
              posted
               
              off
               
              their
               
              suits
               
              with
               
              slow
               
              delays
              .

speaker:
KING
               
              HENRY
text:
My
               
              pity
               
              hath
               
              been
               
              balm
               
              to
               
              heal
               
              their
               
              wounds
              ,

speaker:
KING
               
              HENRY
text:
My
               
              mildness
               
              hath
               
              allayed
               
              their
               
              swelling
               
              griefs
              ,

speaker:
KING
               
              HENRY
text:
My
               
              mercy
               
              dried
               
              their
               
              water-flowing
               
              tears
              .

speaker:
KING
               
              HENRY
text:
I
               
              have
               
              not
               
              been
               
              desirous
               
              of
               
              their
               
              wealth

speaker:
KING
               
              HENRY
text:
Nor
               
              much
               
              oppressed
               
              them
               
              with
               
              great
               
              subsidies
              ,

speaker:
KING
               
              HENRY
text:
Nor
               
              forward
               
              of
               
              revenge
              ,
               
              though
               
              they
               
              much
               
              erred
              .

speaker:
KING
               
              HENRY
text:
Then
               
              why
               
              should
               
              they
               
              love
               
              Edward
               
              more
               
              than
               
              me
              ?

speaker:
KING
               
              HENRY
text:
No
              ,
               
              Exeter
              ,
               
              these
               
              graces
               
              challenge
               
              grace
              ;

speaker:
KING
               
              HENRY
text:
And
               
              when
               
              the
               
              lion
               
              fawns
               
              upon
               
              the
               
              lamb
              ,

speaker:
KING
               
              HENRY
text:
The
               
              lamb
               
              will
               
              never
               
              cease
               
              to
               
              follow
               
              him
              .

speaker: EXETER
text:
Hark
              ,
               
              hark
              ,
               
              my
               
              lord
              ,
               
              what
               
              shouts
               
              are
               
              these
              ?

speaker:
KING
               
              EDWARD
text:
Seize
               
              on
               
              the
               
              shamefaced
               
              Henry
              ,
               
              bear
               
              him
               
              hence
              ,

speaker:
KING
               
              EDWARD
text:
And
               
              once
               
              again
               
              proclaim
               
              us
               
              King
               
              of
               
              England
              .
              —

speaker:
KING
               
              EDWARD
text:
You
               
              are
               
              the
               
              fount
               
              that
               
              makes
               
              small
               
              brooks
               
              to
               
              flow
              .

speaker:
KING
               
              EDWARD
text:
Now
               
              stops
               
              thy
               
              spring
              ;
               
              my
               
              sea
               
              shall
               
              suck
               
              them
               
              dry

speaker:
KING
               
              EDWARD
text:
And
               
              swell
               
              so
               
              much
               
              the
               
              higher
               
              by
               
              their
               
              ebb
              .
              —

speaker:
KING
               
              EDWARD
text:
Hence
               
              with
               
              him
               
              to
               
              the
               
              Tower
              .
               
              Let
               
              him
               
              not
               
              speak
              .

speaker:
KING
               
              EDWARD
text:
And
              ,
               
              lords
              ,
               
              towards
               
              Coventry
               
              bend
               
              we
               
              our
               
              course
              ,

speaker:
KING
               
              EDWARD
text:
Where
               
              peremptory
               
              Warwick
               
              now
               
              remains
              .

speaker:
KING
               
              EDWARD
text:
The
               
              sun
               
              shines
               
              hot
              ,
               
              and
               
              if
               
              we
               
              use
               
              delay
              ,

speaker:
KING
               
              EDWARD
text:
Cold
               
              biting
               
              winter
               
              mars
               
              our
               
              hoped-for
               
              hay
              .

speaker: RICHARD
text:
Away
               
              betimes
              ,
               
              before
               
              his
               
              forces
               
              join
              ,

speaker: RICHARD
text:
And
               
              take
               
              the
               
              great-grown
               
              traitor
               
              unawares
              .

speaker: RICHARD
text:
Brave
               
              warriors
              ,
               
              march
               
              amain
               
              towards
               
              Coventry
              .
